title: Korean Graves build is op as fuk

replies.body:
You sure this is Korean? Just looks like a standard damage build. Ya'know, like how Graves is supposed to build just without Lifesteal.
Doesn't seem too bad, remember he's getting his armor/MR steroid nerfed shortly.
Reverted. Now it's a nerf to the return on Q
What's different about this build opposed to a standard Graves jungle build? I guess you're putting off you BF Sword item by one, but its fairly standard.
I'm pretty sure the OP factor here is graves, not the build
Everything with armorpen is korean ourdays?
I think its more "MONGOLIAN BUILD" Kappa
why is every new build a "korean" build this build is played in all regions for some time now like 1/2 weeks or more
